symbols.name: sap.fe.macros
symbols.description: Library containing the macros for SAP Fiori elements.

symbols.name: sap.fe.macros.Field
symbols.description:
Macro for creating a Field based on the metadata provided by OData V4.
Usually, a DataField or DataPoint annotation is expected, but the macro Field can also be used to display a property from the entity type.
Usage example: 
<macro:Field id="MyField" metaPath="MyProperty" />

properties.name: contextPath
properties.description:
Defines the path of the context used in the current page or block.
This setting is defined by the framework.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The identifier of the Field control.

properties.name: metaPath
properties.description: Defines the relative path of the property in the metamodel, based on the current contextPath.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: An expression that allows you to control the read-only state of the field.

events.name: change
events.description: An event containing details is triggered when the value of the field is changed.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Retrieves the current value of the Field.

returnValue.description: the current value of the field
